meanings.definition: A decorative design made by cutting pieces of one material and applying them to the surface of another.
meanings.sent1: She created a beautiful applique on her pillow by sewing on colorful fabric shapes.
meanings.sent2: The quilt had intricate applique flowers stitched onto the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The applique on the dress looked like a tiny garden blooming on the fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her applique design was like a patchwork of memories sewn together.
meanings.sent5: The applique added a touch of elegance to the plain tablecloth.

meanings.definition: A small decorative piece of fabric or other material applied to a larger piece to form a picture or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The applique of a butterfly on the shirt made it stand out.
meanings.sent2: She sewed an adorable applique of a cat onto her backpack.
meanings.sent3: The applique of a smiling sun on the curtain brightened up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her applique of a star on the hat made her feel like a shining superstar.
meanings.sent5: The applique of a heart on the quilt symbolized love and warmth.
